gen:link.msg:message: {fmt:common(($oeis_a, $a, $b, $oeis_b, $oeis_c))} if ({fmt:fact($oeis_a, ($oeis_a, $a, $b, $oeis_b, $oeis_c))}) then (({fmt:fact($a, ($oeis_a, $a, $b, $oeis_b, $oeis_c))} div {fmt:fact($b, ($oeis_a, $a, $b, $oeis_b, $oeis_c))}) = 0.0025 {fmt:threshold(iaf:error-margin((iaf:numeric-divide($a, $b))) + iaf:error-margin(0.0025))} {fmt:difference(abs((($a div $b)) - (0.0025)))}) else (if ({fmt:fact($oeis_b, ($oeis_a, $a, $b, $oeis_b, $oeis_c))}) then (({fmt:fact($a, ($oeis_a, $a, $b, $oeis_b, $oeis_c))} div {fmt:fact($b, ($oeis_a, $a, $b, $oeis_b, $oeis_c))}) = 0.0075 {fmt:threshold(iaf:error-margin((iaf:numeric-divide($a, $b))) + iaf:error-margin(0.0075))} {fmt:difference(abs((($a div $b)) - (0.0075)))}) else efn:imp({fmt:fact($oeis_c, ($oeis_a, $a, $b, $oeis_b, $oeis_c))}, (({fmt:fact($a, ($oeis_a, $a, $b, $oeis_b, $oeis_c))} div {fmt:fact($b, ($oeis_a, $a, $b, $oeis_b, $oeis_c))}) = 0.01 {fmt:threshold(iaf:error-margin((iaf:numeric-divide($a, $b))) + iaf:error-margin(0.01))} {fmt:difference(abs((($a div $b)) - (0.01)))})))
